  
BLOCK ELEMENTS TEST

FROM XML:
<xslTutorial>
<LEGEND>this</LEGEND><LEGEND>rocks</LEGEND>
<LEGEND>this</LEGEND>
<LEGEND>rocks</LEGEND>
<LEGEND>this</LEGEND>
<LEGEND>rocks</LEGEND>
<LEGEND>this</LEGEND>
<LEGEND>rocks</LEGEND>
<SPAN>this</SPAN><LEGEND>rocks</LEGEND>
<SPAN>this</SPAN>
<LEGEND>rocks</LEGEND>
</xslTutorial>
